answerText: somatostatin[10] These endocrine cell clusters in the pancreas contain alpha and beta cells and ultimately produce insulin and glucagon.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Seven Lakes/Rockefeller  | 3 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This hormone comes in 14 and 28 amino acid length forms. For 10 points each: [10] The delta cells in the pancreas help produce this inhibitory hormone that inhibits the release of growth hormone and thyroid-stimulating hormone.
